verses.name: Psalms 31:1
verses.text: In thee, O Lord, do I put my trust; let me never be ashamed: deliver me in thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 31:2
verses.text: Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:3
verses.text: For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name’s sake lead me, and guide me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:4
verses.text: Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me: for thou art my strength.

verses.name: Psalms 31:5
verses.text: Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O Lord God of truth.
